name: triticale
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of grain that is a a mixture of wheat and rye, or the plant from which this grain comes: Now they are growing organic corn, oats, and triticale on their farm. Triticale flour can produce a good loaf if it's prepared properly.
More examplesFewer examplesTriticale is now being used in a wide variety of foods.Our triticale is mostly used for animal feed.Farmers in the United States are showing more interest in triticale.Triticale bread looks like wholemeal bread and tastes like a mixture of rye and wheat.Triticale kernels are ground into flour to prepare tortillas.
